snippet.title: Pro Yakyuu Family Stadium (Famicom) - Commercial
snippet.description: A 30-second ad for Pro Yakyuu Family Stadium, a 1986 baseball video game by Namco for the Nintendo Famicom (NES). Dragon Buster is also included in the same ad, another Namco game of the time. Two years later, a version of Pro Yakyuu Family Stadium would be released in North America as R.B.I. Baseball. For more info on the game, check out the 30-30.club encyclopedia entry here: https://30-30.club/wiki/r-b-i-baseball-pro-yakyuu-family-stadium/
